statements: SELECT * FROM wrestling_programs;
SELECT program_name, coach_id FROM wrestling_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM wrestling_programs WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_programs WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT program_id, program_name, coach_id FROM wrestling_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_programs WHERE coach_id = 5;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM wrestling_programs WHERE program_id = 10;
SELECT program_name, coach_id, start_date, end_date FROM wrestling_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM wrestling_programs WHERE coach_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY end_date DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT coach_id FROM wrestling_programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Youth%';
SELECT * FROM wrestling_training_programs;
SELECT program_name, duration_hours FROM wrestling_training_programs WHERE training_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT coach_name, expertise_area FROM coaches WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM wrestling_training_programs ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM coaches WHERE expertise_area = 'Strength Training' OR expertise_area = 'Cardio';
SELECT * FROM wrestling_training_programs WHERE duration_hours > 3 ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM wrestling_training_programs WHERE training_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT coach_name, expertise_area, experience_years FROM coaches WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY coach_id;
SELECT program_name, duration_hours, training_level FROM wrestling_training_programs WHERE program_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY duration_hours ASC;
SELECT coach_name, contact_email FROM coaches WHERE expertise_area LIKE '%Wrestling%' AND experience_years >= 3 ORDER BY coach_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM training_programs WHERE program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT coach_name, coach_email FROM coaches ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_id, coach_id, session_date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE program_name = 'First Aid Training';
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM training_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(program_id) AS total_programs FROM training_programs GROUP BY program_name;
SELECT tp.program_name, c.coach_name FROM training_programs tp JOIN coaches c ON tp.program_id = c.coach_id;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM coaches ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM training_programs WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_age > 25 ORDER BY wrestler_weight ASC;
SELECT coach_name, coach_specialty FROM coaches WHERE coach_specialty = 'Wrestling';
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight FROM wrestlers ORDER BY wrestler_weight DESC, wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM training_programs WHERE program_id > 3 ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT coach_name, coach_specialty FROM coaches WHERE coach_specialty = 'Wrestling' ORDER BY coach_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age, wrestler_weight FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_age >= 25 ORDER BY wrestler_weight DESC, wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_training_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM wrestling_training_programs;
SELECT coach_id, program_name, program_description FROM wrestling_training_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestling_style FROM wrestlers ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT session_name, location FROM training_sessions WHERE max_capacity > 10 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT coach_name, specialization FROM coaches WHERE experience_years > 10 ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description, start_date FROM wrestling_training_programs WHERE coach_id = 3 AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestling_style FROM wrestlers ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT session_name, location, session_date FROM training_sessions WHERE max_capacity > 20 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
